author: Staff Reporter
text:
Following the death of Nalini Sriharan’s father in Tirunelveli district on Tuesday, her mother has sought parole for Nalini to enable her attend the final rites in Chennai.

M. Radhakrishnan, counsel for Nalini, said her mother, Padmavathi, has sent the parole application by fax to the Inspector General of Prisons, Chennai and Superintendent of Prison, Special Prison for Women, Vellore.

Nalini, one of the life convicts in the Rajiv Gandhi assassination case, is lodged in the Special Prison for Women, Vellore.

“Her father, Sankara Narayanan, died in Tirunelveli district on Tuesday morning. They are bringing the body to Chennai for the final rites and cremation,” he said.

Her mother has made the representation to the prison authorities seeking grant of parole for Nalini for three days from Wednesday, he added.
title: Nalini’s father dead, parole sought
